Key Features of Polo Blue EDT

Launched in 2003, Polo Blue was created by master perfumer Carlos Benaim as a modern interpretation of the classic Polo fragrance line. The scent quickly became one of Ralph Lauren's best sellers, establishing itself as a cornerstone of contemporary men's fragrances with its perfect balance of freshness and sophistication. The distinctive blue bottle represents the oceanic inspiration behind this new arrival to the fragrance world. ðŸ’«

The aquatic cologne opens with crisp cucumber and juicy melon notes that create an immediate sense of refreshment. As it develops, herbaceous heart notes of basil and sage add complexity and masculine character, while the base of suede and musk provides a lasting foundation that's both sophisticated and sensual. Perfect for the man who appreciates luxury fragrances with a contemporary edge. âœ¨

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Polo Blue EDT last on skin?
Polo Blue Eau de Toilette typically lasts 6-8 hours on most skin types. As an EDT concentration, it delivers moderate longevity with a refreshing projection during the first 2-3 hours before settling into a more intimate scent. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and moisturized skin. Many users report excellent performance in moderate weather conditions, making it ideal for spring and summer wear. ðŸŒ¿
